# Intellectual Property & Licensing

## Software

All TIOTF open-source projects use OSI-approved licenses.
Default license: Apache License 2.0.

## Contributions

Contributor License Agreements (CLAs) or equivalent are required.

## Trademarks & Certification

TIOTF retains ownership of:

- Trademarks
- Logos
- Certification marks

Certification programs are vendor-neutral and royalty-free.
